## Description

Brief description of your changes.

## Type of Change

- [ ] New example
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] Enhancement (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Dependency update

## Example(s) Affected

- [ ] core/hello-world
- [ ] core/vanilla-js
- [ ] frameworks/nextjs
- [ ] frameworks/express
- [ ] frameworks/react-vite
- [ ] shared/mock-server
- [ ] Other: ___

## Checklist

### For New Examples

- [ ] README.md with all required sections
- [ ] env.example with all required variables
- [ ] package.json with pinned dependencies
- [ ] Smoke tests that pass against mock server
- [ ] Tests complete in under 60 seconds
- [ ] Added to main README.md table
- [ ] No console.log statements (except debug mode)

### For All Changes

- [ ] Code follows existing style
- [ ] Changes are tested locally
- [ ] Dependencies are pinned to specific versions
- [ ] No hardcoded API keys or secrets

Add screenshots showing the example in action.
